0.0.1.en: Ability to add BMW with Connected Drive Services

0.0.5.en: Improved capability detection for older cars. Added Remaining Fuel capability.

0.0.9.en: Added lock unlock flow for older cars. Added location capability and geofence based flow triggers. Added logging.

0.0.17.en: Added flow trigger to improve log odometer readings. Added text address capability. Added flow trigger when refuelled.

0.1.2.en: Fixed authentication issue and remote services.

0.1.5.en: Updated dependency to fix issue with talking to the BMW API.

0.1.6.en: Updated dependency to fix issue with talking to the BMW API.

0.1.7.en: Fixed issue regarding lock status and location changed trigger.

0.2.0.en: Added support for users in the North America region.

0.2.1.en: Added geofence enter and exit trigger. Added support in settings page to use the current location of the vehicle.

0.2.2.en: Added support to switch between miles and km in device settings.

0.3.0.en: Added support for geofence based trigger, miles/km support, l/GAL (US)/GAL (UK) support, improved error handling

0.4.0.en: Added condition cards for battery level, charging status and geofence location.

0.4.1.en: Fixed issue with location changed trigger if it is not in geofence.

0.5.0.en: Added Climate Cancel action card and Climate Started and Stopped trigger cards
